title: Runtime Smoke Gate Allowlist Schema
description: Schema for runtime smoke gate override entries. Allows specific endpoints to return non-200 status codes without failing the deploy.

issue_id.description: GitHub issue or incident ID (e.g., INC-2026-01-30-CORS, #123)

owner.description: Email or GitHub username of the owner responsible for fixing

expiry_date.description: ISO 8601 date (YYYY-MM-DD) in UTC when this override expires. Expiry is checked at start of day UTC (inclusive). For status 500: MUST be within 48 hours of today.

reason.description: Clear explanation of why this override is needed. For status 500: MUST contain 'KNOWN_BUG_TEMPORARY'.

allowed_status_codes.description: HTTP status codes that are temporarily allowed (4xx/5xx only). Default recommended: [503]. Status 500 has strict policy requirements.

incident_doc.description: Path to incident document. REQUIRED when allowed_status_codes includes 500. Must match pattern: docs/evidence/INC-*.md

status_503.description: Service Unavailable - standard allowlist rules apply

status_500.expiry: MUST be within 48 hours of today (UTC)
